d1_text:
Npc0830:
ï¿½I didn't have a problem digging until this...[PAUSE 20] I found a maze.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Lots of monsters appeared, so I couldn't proceed.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There's 5 big moles...![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If I beat the monsters, I can continue on.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I think I have a bleeding ulcer from worrying too much.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm helpless to really do anything.[HALT][END]
